system.description: The character's strong will allows them to resist psychic attacks, using willpower to evade such powers.
system.benefit: Character can use their Willpower Characteristic when making Evasion Reactions against Ranged or Melee Psychic Attacks, and is not required to move when avoiding area of effect psychic attacks.

specialAbilities.name: Psychic Resistance
specialAbilities.description: You can use your Willpower characteristic when making Evasion reactions against psychic attacks (ranged or melee). You are not required to move when avoiding area of effect psychic attacks.
